metadata.description: Open-source tools with truly free commercial licenses for Radiant AI orchestration

tools.name: Weaviate
tools.description: Vector database with ML model integration

tools.name: AutoGluon
tools.description: AutoML for tabular, text, time series

tools.name: Instructor
tools.description: Structured extraction from LLMs using Pydantic

tools.name: Numba
tools.description: JIT compiler for Python using LLVM

tools.name: Darts
tools.description: Time series library with unified interface

tools.name: FastAPI
tools.description: Modern fast web framework for APIs

tools.name: DVC
tools.description: Data Version Control for ML projects

tools.name: Prometheus
tools.description: Monitoring system and time series database

tools.name: GROBID
tools.description: ML library for extracting scientific data from PDFs

tools.name: NGINX
tools.description: High performance HTTP and reverse proxy server

tools.name: Caddy
tools.description: Fast web server with automatic HTTPS

tools.name: Traefik
tools.description: Modern HTTP reverse proxy and load balancer

tools.name: OpenFOAM (Foundation)
tools.license_note: GPL but widely used commercially via service models

tools.name: Streamlit
tools.description: Fast way to build data apps

tools.name: Dolphin Mixtral 8x7B
tools.description: Uncensored Mixtral fine-tune for unrestricted assistance - no RLHF safety filters

tools.name: Llama 3 70B Uncensored
tools.description: Uncensored Llama 3 for unrestricted reasoning - bypasses corporate safety constraints

tools.name: WizardLM 13B Uncensored
tools.description: Fast uncensored model for quick unrestricted tasks - smaller but nimble

tools.name: Nous Hermes 2 Mixtral
tools.description: High-capability uncensored Mixtral variant - excellent for creative and unrestricted use

tools.name: ParaView
tools.description: Industry-standard scientific visualization for petabyte-scale CFD/FEA datasets - parallel rendering, Python scripting, in-situ visualization

tools.name: VTK (Visualization Toolkit)
tools.description: 3D computer graphics, image processing, and visualization library - foundation for ParaView and many commercial tools

tools.name: CadQuery
tools.description: Python library for building parametric 3D CAD models using fluent API - script-based CAD on OpenCASCADE kernel

tools.name: Pint
tools.description: Physical quantities with units - automatic unit conversion and dimensional analysis for Python (prevents Mars Climate Orbiter errors)

tools.name: pycalculix
tools.description: Python interface to CalculiX FEA solver - automates model creation, meshing (Gmsh), solving, and results extraction

tools.name: PyMesh
tools.description: Geometry processing library - mesh boolean operations, repair, conversion using CGAL/libigl/Cork/Tetgen backends
